title: HOLY...... IT IS HERE!!!!
body:
I have waited  so long, my hype can not be contained. I love this game so much. It is probably one  of my favorite solo games ever created... and then they come out with this.... in ALPHA TESTING????

http://www.hinterlandforums.com/viewtopic.php?f=58&t=7903

I... can die happy.

P.S. this game has hidden ration bunkers. I have played 100 hours  and have not found one yet. It is driving me clinically insane, but i love it. Nearly the entire map is burned into my memory. I can't stop. I am addicted. pls halp? better yet don't. Let me waste my life away in bliss.
